name: UIDocumentPickerMode
desc: Modes that define the type of file transfer operation that the document picker uses.

items.name: case `import`
items.desc: The document picker imports a file from outside the app’s sandbox.

items.name: case open
items.desc: The document picker opens an external file outside the app’s sandbox.

items.name: case exportToService
items.desc: The document picker exports a local file to a destination outside the app’s sandbox.

items.name: case moveToService
items.desc: The document picker moves a local file outside the app’s sandbox and provides access to it as an external file.
